title: "E-commerce"
subtitle: Our team has in-depth knowledge of the e-commerce ecosystem and experience in managing critical issues having worked for leading e-commerce companies in India.
img: "/images/practice-areas/ecommerce.jpg"

url: "#4"
---

Our team has in-depth knowledge of the e-commerce ecosystem and experience in managing critical issues having worked for leading e-commerce companies in India. We use our experience and expertise to:
   
  - Assist in interpretation of applicable laws.
  - Providing guidance on business strategy based on prevailing regulations.
  - Undertake gap analysis on existing business and provide solutions in line with existing laws.
  - Assist in structuring of new business in line with the law.
  - Assist in training business teams on compliance of laws applicable to e-commerce industries
